Text:
Thanks for uploading this basho, I have a few questions. 

Are the mpg files you posted captured in HD?

Also the smaller ones are in avi, do these use the xvid codec?

I unfortunately found your uploads just now so I won't be able to download the mpg version. I will for the next basho! (hopefully you will post them as well)

I convert from MPG to Xvid using quickmedia convert.  Unfortunately, the original isn't in HD, just the regular signal available in North America.  

I might just post in only MPG next time.
Thanks Sci-fi, I'll check it out.
going to stop seeding now.  Next Basho coming up in a couple of days!
